title: Friday Roundup: Girls Gotta Eat Dirt, Breaking Down Barriers, carbon neutral racing & more!
content:
Girls Gotta Eat Dirt, because life is jort – Colorado denim specialists Ripton & Co are bringing the stoke this week with their first short film, titled ‘Girls Gotta Eat Dirt‘. The all-women mountain biking film does include a lot of riding in cut-off jean shorts, but it’s more the light-hearted story arc and killer […]

The post Friday Roundup: Girls Gotta Eat Dirt, Breaking Down Barriers, carbon neutral racing & more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
